meanings.sent1: She handled the paperwork administratively, ensuring all forms were properly filled out.
meanings.sent2: The office manager organizes files administratively to keep everything in order.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to administratively organize its toys by color, but ended up with a mess.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked administratively, categorizing thoughts into neat mental folders.
meanings.sent5: The teacher explained the concept administratively, breaking it down step by step.

meanings.definition: Relating to the management of a business or organization
meanings.sent1: The administratively skilled CEO efficiently led the company to success.
meanings.sent2: The team implemented administratively sound policies to improve productivity.
meanings.sent3: The administratively gifted squirrel managed to store nuts in perfect order.
meanings.sent4: Her leadership style was like an administratively well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The new software streamlined the administratively complex tasks.
